name: Cinnamon Boutique Guest House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's all been said by previous reviewers. This place is fantastic and fantastic value for money. The restaurant is also excellent, but we preferred The Girls in the village, about a 5 minute walk from the hotel.
reviews.title: One more 5-star review

reviews.text: The Cinnamon Boutique is an extremely luxurious hotel. The welcome was warm and sincere. The bedrooms are hugely spacious and magnificent in keeping with the rest of the hotel. There is an honesty bar which suited our requirements exactly. Breakfast is made to order and most satisfying. The onsite restaurant is top rate and has won awards recently. We would doubtless return for more R & R.
reviews.title: An elegant and most luxurious hotel - we will return !

reviews.text: It is within easy walking distance from a magnificent sandy beach and other excellent restaurants. We would recommend the Girls Restaurant. There is also a small market / craft fair nearby.
reviews.title: absolutely first class, worthy of highest * rating!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous hotel, superb friendly staff and food to die for! The rooms are out of this world with the size, decoration and all other facilities being of the highest quality, including the bath robes and other details not expected to be found in what at first sight appeared to be a normal b & b! Cannot give enough accolades in 50 words so just go and try for yourself as you will not be disappointed and wonder why it is not publicised more.
reviews.title: A jewel in the Wilderness

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very very good value for money
reviews.title: relaxed, comfortable, goodfood, goodcompany, the bestwelcome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we loved everything about Cinnamon house,a luxury tranquil five
reviews.title: it was the best part of our trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: days of bliss. We were looked after from the wonderful breakfast
reviews.title: First class accommadation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: to the very impressive restaurant were we ate all kinds of meats and fish that were all delicious, however for me the puddings were superb. Desmond and Johan are perfect hosts i would recommend this hotel to anyone who is traveling the garden route as Wilderness has so much to offer its like the Lake District with sun.
reviews.title: A Real Treat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we spent 3 nights in the cinnamon boutique while touring south africa it was 1st class. the rooms were big, bright and beautifully furnished. desmond and johan were perfect hosts and our only regret was we did not try the restaurant. 10 out of 10
reviews.title: just the best romantic getaway

likes.liked: — big rooms, very good beds, perfect bathroom,very good restaurant, lovely decorations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for one night on our travels along the garden route and we were really sorry not to have longer. It's a beautifully decorated place with lots of areas to relax in and relaxing music playing in the background. The bedroom had everything you could want and the bathroom was huge! We also ate one of the best meals of our whole South African experience at this guesthouse. Thanks to everyone for making it so wonderful!
reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations

likes.liked: — Very tastefully decorated - every room was individual

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Little to add to the other reviews. Nothing to criticise - everything to praise. Rooms and food exceptional. Genuinely one of the best, if not the best, hotel experience we have had anywhere in the world.
reviews.title: One of the best hotels ever!

reviews.text: Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Outstanding attention to detail and excellent food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Cinnamon Boutique in Feb and were amazed at the quality and attention to detail of the interior, and the lovely gardens. Rooms were excellent and spacious, especially the ones overlooking the gardens at the rear. The quality of the food and service was excellent in nice peaceful surroundings, with friendly hosts in Des and Johan. A highly recommended place to stay, in a relaxing and unhurried environment.
reviews.title: A great welcome to a lovely place
Restaurant
reviews.text: Loved the location and grounds, bedroom, food and service. The personal welcome and attention to detail from Desmond and Johan really make this place stand out. Our 2nd visit, and we'll be back.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We didn't stay at the hotel, but ate in the restaurant twice in a week - this says it all we think. The food was fantastic, waiter service excellent, and the decor of the house was unbelievable. We loved it.
reviews.title: Great place to relax

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Quiet, relaxing and really close to village and beach. Hosts Desmond and Johan make you feel very welcome and comfortable and their restaurant is fantastic, best food in the village by far. Would definitely stay again and recommend to anyone who is stopping at Wilderness or wants a base to explore the garden route on their vacation. Take a look at their website for more info http://www.cinnamonhouse.co.za/ but we booked through Safarinow.com.
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A fabulous place to stay - tranquil, lovely rooms (ours had a double balcony), lots of space, the whole place beautifully furnished and great hosts, Desmond and Johan.
reviews.title: Loved every minute

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Soaked up the sun (there's a pool too) on the terrace with the hills and woods providing a picture backdrop.
reviews.title: Something Special

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It has its own restaurant too which was top notch and clearly a big hit with local residents and us.
reviews.title: An Oasis in Wilderness

likes.liked: — The Attention to detail, First Class decor
likes.disliked: — there is nothing to dislike about the Cinnamon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 3 nights on our way along the Garden Route and loved it - great food, great service in great surroundings.
reviews.title: Don't miss out on this gem

aka: Cinnamon Boutique Guest House Hotel Wilderness
description: Luxurious,four star Guest House in the heart of Wilderness Village. 9 double en suite bedrooms of which five can be twin beds,all en suite.3 Family rooms, two of which are down stairs,and consist of 2 x 3/4 bedsen suite bathrooms.Room 11 has a T.V. lounge area as well as an extra single bed, on the large enclosed balcony.Room 12 has a double bunk bed , a large semi enclosed balcony as well as an inter leading room which has a King size bed and is en suite.All bedrooms have bar fridges,hair dryers, air conditioning, tea/coffee facilities and large balconies.There is also meeting room that seats 12/15 people that is totally private, overlooking the pool/patio area.All the lounges,Bar and Breakfast rooms are on the ground floor.
